statements: UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET engagement_likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET engagement_comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET engagement_shares = 20 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET engagement_likes = engagement_likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET engagement_comments = engagement_comments + 1, engagement_shares = engagement_shares + 2 WHERE post_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagement SET post_content = 'New updated content', engagement_likes = engagement_likes + 5, engagement_comments = engagement_comments + 2 WHERE post_id = 789 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET engagement_count = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET post = 'New Post Content' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE marketing_analysis SET engagement_score = 9.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET engagement_count = engagement_count + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_analysis SET engagement_score = (SELECT AVG(engagement_count) FROM social_media_engagement) WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET post = CONCAT(post, ' - Updated') WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET followers = 500 WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE marketing_analysis SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE post_id = 20;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments + 2 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profile SET followers = followers + 10, following = following + 5 WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE marketing_analysis SET engagement_score = engagement_score * 1.2, marketing_campaign = 'Summer Sale Campaign' WHERE post_id = 789 AND analysis_date = '2023-06-15';
UPDATE SocialMediaUsers SET followers = followers + 100 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Posts SET likes = likes + 10, comments = comments + 5 WHERE post_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AdCampaigns SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SocialMediaUsers SET followers = followers + 100 WHERE username = 'user123';
UPDATE Posts SET comments = comments + 10, likes = likes + 20 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE AdCampaigns SET target_audience = 'New Audience', start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = likes_count + 10, comments_count = comments_count + 5 WHERE post_id = 101;
UPDATE engagements SET reaction_type = 'like' WHERE engagement_id = 201;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE account_name = 'Twitter'
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = likes_count + 50, comments_count = comments_count + 25 WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
UPDATE engagements SET reaction_type = 'comment' WHERE account_id = 100
